description:
An alternative client for the Bitwarden¬Æ platform

Keyguard is an alternative client for the Bitwarden¬Æ platform, created to provide the best user experience possible.
Highlights:
- a beautiful rich and responsive Material You user interface;
- a powerful and fast search;
- a support for creating & using passkeys - a modern alternative to passwords.
- a watchtower that finds items with Pwned passwords, Vulnerable accounts, Reused passwords, Inactive two factor authentication, Inactive passkeys, Unsecure Websites as well as Duplicate, Incomplete and Expiring items, and other;
- multi-account support üå† with secure login and two-factor authentication support;
- add items üå† and sends üå†, modify üå†, and view your vault offline;
- export individual or organization items, including the attachments;
- beautiful Light/Dark theme;
- a generator with SSH keys, Email forwarders, Custom wordlists support, and many other features;
- a support for placeholders and URL overrides;
- and much more!
üå† - on Android requires the Premium one-time or subscription license.
This release introduces functional and user interface updates for Windows. The trust manager has been consolidated to combine the Windows-My, Windows-ROOT, and default certificate stores. On Windows, the main window title will now dynamically change to match the selected application theme. A bug has also been fixed where blank tags were incorrectly being saved with vault ciphers.
[!NOTE]
I've finally updated the Android release pipeline to automatically push the release to production track on release. No longer needed for me to manually promote this day's nightly internal build to production, yay! As a bonus, we now get the release summary attached to the Play store release üçª
All changes
- 5a212861 - chore: Adjust LLM prompt for better changelog summaries
- 0cb29d41 - chore(deps): Bump Kotlin version to 2.3.10-RC
- 8b7205a3 - fix(Vault): Only save the Cipher's tags that are not blank
- ee0a1c67 - chore(build): Bump Kotlin to 2.3.0, Ktor to 3.4.0 and Serialization to 1.10.0
- bfc28a82 - chore: Other fixes for the Release workflow
- 1ceafab8 - chore: Fix Android app is not uploaded as an artifact
- 1da4b532 - chore: Fix Android app baseline profiles build artifact conflict
- 1df442f0 - chore: Fix Android app version code generation script
- da4ccd05 - chore(deps): Bump signalr to 9.0.12
- d11cf598 - chore(deps): Bump sqlite-jdbc-crypt to 3.51.2.0
- 79ee285c - chore(deps): Bump sqlcipher-android to 4.13.0
- a04b006b - chore(deps): Bump HtmlText to 3.0.0-beta02
- b4e5ebba - Merge pull request #1235 from AChep/localization_action
- da76dbfa - [AUTO] Update localization library
- 33cc7fc7 - chore(Android): Correct pip install command
- d36a25b3 - chore(Android): Fake daily tag format during internal build
- 708e69ef - chore(Android): Rework pipeline to Build the prod app during release and include the changes into a Play Store release
- 51f8ca3d - chore: Bump app version name to 2.3.3
- 086db34b - improvement(Windows,UI): Change the Window title basing on the App theme
- 0a36057c - improvement(Windows): Combine Windows-My, Windows-ROOT and the default trust manager #1227
